item.title: Data Warehouse Design
item.description: Recap Database Design DW Design Process more or less same steps as DB-Design our topics: Dimensional Fact Model & mUML & starER Conceptual Design Transformation of the semi-formal business requirements specification into a formalized conceptual multidimensional schema most produce a graphical multidimensional schema Dimensional Fact Model, UML-based, starER Conceptual DEsign based on business requirement specification schema of operational systems Process model to conceptual DW-Design context definition of measures dimensional hierarchy design summarizability constraints Logical Design Convert the conceptual schema to a logical one with respect to the target data model.
